description: 7^a(n) is smallest nonnegative power of 7 containing the string 'n'.
comments: See A176767 for the actual powers 7^a(n). - _M. F. Hasler_, Oct 03 2014
mathematica: Table[k = 0; While[ StringPosition[ ToString[7^k], ToString[n] ] == {}, k++ ]; k, {n, 0, 75} ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 24 2001
